pageContext.claim: “If you look at the Department of Labor … Secretary Azar, what they've done. They've come up with some incredible health care plans, which is causing great competition and driving the prices right down.”
pageContext.analysis: The Labor Department in August 2018 implemented a new rule allowing businesses in the same geographic area or industry to band together to negotiate "association health plans" with insurers. But health care prices are still rising.
